import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import firebase from "../../firebase/firebase" export const Excel = () => { const [profesionales, setProfesionales] = useState([]) const [montos, setMontos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { firebase.db.collection("profesionales").onSnapshot(querySnapshot => { const profesionales = [] querySnapshot.docs.forEach(doc => { const { name, id } = doc.data() profesionales.push({ id: doc.id, name }) }) setProfesionales(profesionales) }) }, []) const guardarMontos = (value, id) => { const foundIndex = profesionales.findIndex(item => item.id === id) const obj = profesionales[foundIndex] obj["monto"] = value } console.log(profesionales) return
MONTO
IIBB
%CIRC
CIRC/ALQ
BCO
TOTAL
{profesionales.map(item =>
{item.name}
guardarMontos(e.target.value, item.id)} />
)}
}
